parkingRobot.hsamr0

Class ControlRST

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkingRobot.hsamr0.ControlRST
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControl

    public class ControlRST
extends Object
implements IControl
    Main class for control module

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface parkingRobot.IControl

        IControl.ControlMode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlRST(IPerception perception, INavigation navigation, NXTMotor leftMotor, NXTMotor rightMotor)
      provides the reference transfer so that the class knows its corresponding navigation object (to obtain the current position of the car from) and starts the control thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlRST

        public ControlRST(IPerception perception,
          INavigation navigation,
          NXTMotor leftMotor,
          NXTMotor rightMotor)
        provides the reference transfer so that the class knows its corresponding navigation object (to obtain the current position of the car from) and starts the control thread.
        Parameters:
        perception - corresponding main module Perception class object
        navigation - corresponding main module Navigation class object
        leftMotor - corresponding NXTMotor object
        rightMotor - corresponding NXTMotor object
